TaxonIdentification.variety_name: 长茎薹草 ( 原变种) chang jing tai cao (yuan bian zhong)

treatment.description: Culms 25–35 cm tall. Leaves longer or slightly shorter than culm. Male spikes 2–4, congregated at top of culm, cylindric, 0.5–2.5 cm; remaining spikes bisexual, androgynous, oblong-cylindric or narrowly oblong, 2–3 cm. Utricles 2.5–3 mm.
treatment.distribution: Wet places at riversides, forests on mountain slopes, grasslands; 2700–4100 m. Xizang, Yunnan [Bhutan, India, Nepal].
